item.title: Selected Publications
item.description: All Publications Selected Publications Selected peer-reviewed publications, 2003 - 2017. See my Google Scholar for citations and sources. Canopy structure, allometry and plant architecture Duursma, R.A., Gimeno, T.E., Boer, M.M., Crous, K.Y., Tjoelker, M.G., Ellsworth, D.S. 2016. Canopy leaf area of a mature evergreen Eucalyptus woodland does not respond to elevated atmospheric [CO2] but tracks water availability. Global Change Biology, 22, 1666-1676 . Duursma, R.A., Falster, D.S. 2016.
